properties.name: f1.telemetry.buffer.capacity
properties.description: The maximum number of telemetry packets the ring buffer can hold. Once this limit is reached, the oldest packets will be overwritten. Default: 10,000 packets

properties.name: f1.telemetry.buffer.enable-packet-size-stats
properties.description: Whether to enable detailed packet size statistics. When enabled, tracks distribution of packet sizes for analysis. Default: false (disabled for performance)

properties.name: f1.telemetry.buffer.high-utilization-threshold
properties.description: Threshold percentage for logging warnings when buffer utilization is high. When buffer usage exceeds this percentage, warnings will be logged. Default: 80% (0.8)

properties.name: f1.telemetry.buffer.operation-timeout-ms
properties.description: Maximum time in milliseconds to wait when buffer operations are blocked. This prevents indefinite blocking during high-load scenarios. Default: 100ms

properties.name: f1.telemetry.buffer.stats-interval
properties.description: Interval in seconds for logging buffer statistics. This determines how frequently buffer utilization metrics are logged. Default: 10 seconds
